      java.lang.String checkGrade(java.lang.String studentName, java.lang.String professor, java.lang.String course1)
      checkGrade() which returns the associated float value in grade objects precondition: assignment has grade post condition: returns the grade value (float) taken from the assignment
      void removeAssignment()
      removeAssignment() removes an already existing assignment object from the relevant course and "sets" the visibility to false as long as there is no grade associated with the assignment precondition: an assignment without a grade exists postCondition: the assignment is removed from the array and visibility is set to false void does not @return
